welcome_msg.title: Welcome to <2>useQuiz()</2>
welcome_msg.secondary: The easiest way to learn, create and share quizzes

features.title: What can you do with useQuiz?

study.title: Study
study.desc: Practice with unlimited questions from all subjects.

create.title: Create
create.desc: Make your own custom questions easily.

collections.title: Collections
collections.desc: Group questions into packs and share them.

rate.title: Rate
rate.desc: Give feedback and discuss questions from others.

completed.title: Congratulations! You've completed <1>{{title}}</1>
completed.score: You've completed correctly <1>{{score}}</1> out of <1>{{total}}</1> questions, so your accourancy is <2>{{score_percent}}%</2>

changepack_warning.info_one: Currently you have an active pack with <1>{{count}}</1> question and the following stats
changepack_warning.info_other: Currently you have an active pack with <1>{{count}}</1> questions and the following stats
changepack_warning.question: Are you sure you want to abandon the current pack and start a new one?

selection_error.content: You must select at least one option to be able to verify your answer.

404.title: Ooooops! Are you lost?
404.subtitle: It seems like the page you are looking for does not exist.
404.contact: If you think this is an error, please contact us.

under_construction.title: Under construction
under_construction.subtitle: This page / feature is under construction.
under_construction.desc: We are working hard to make it available soon, so stay tuned for updates!

about.title: About this project
about.desc: <0>useQuiz</0> is a modern and intuitive platform designed to help you study, create, and share quizzes in a simple and powerful way. Built for both casual learners and educators, useQuiz offers:

features_list.1: A clean interface to explore questions by subject and unit.
features_list.2: A dynamic quiz mode to track your progress with instant feedback.
features_list.5: A future-ready system for saving your stats and syncing across devices.

about.desc2: This project is currently <1>under development</1> and aims to provide a fun and engaging experience for anyone who wants to learn, practice or test their knowledge. We're constantly working on new features such as user accounts, ranking systems, and collaborative quizzes. If you're using useQuiz, you're already learning smarter.

details_list.2: <0>Objective:</0> <1>Practice test questions in a simple way.</1>
details_list.3: <0>Future versions:</0> <1>user accounts, rating and comment systems, save progress and collaborative quizzes...</1>

about_me.name: Alejandro Lugo
about_me.title: About me
about_me.info: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for creating innovative solutions. I love exploring new technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible. I'm constantly learning and improving my skills, and I'm excited to build step by step the useQuiz platform âž¤

about.footer: This project is in constant development. Thanks for trying it!
